name: Grey Gull Limited
tagline: Digital publishing consultants specialising in ePub conversions and Apple iBooks publications
body:
### Grey Gull Limited
Grey Gull Limited is a digital publishing consultancy specialising in ePub conversions and the productions of Apple iBooks publications.

We produce publications ready for immediate sale, formatted to the highest standard.

### ePub Conversions
If you have legacy publications that you want to publish as ePubs, simply contact us for a quote.

### Consultancy
We do everything.

### Contact
Email stephen@greygull.com
